summary: My first mod. Sorry if it sucks. It is voice acted.
descriptionHtml:
[i]Hello. What a way to start. Alright well this is a simple follower mod, it is voice acted by myself, so sorry if it sucks. If i think that it sound horrendous i will change to a vanilla voice. I'm not sure if I'll update it a lot.

[size=6]Story
[/size] [font=Comic Sans MS]"I don't come from Skyrim... I come from a diffrent world by the name of Alrikseai[/font][/i][i][size=2],perhaps you have heard of it, in your dreams. My parents [/size][font=Comic Sans MS]abandoned[/font][size=2][font=Comic Sans MS] me there, left me for dead. I was only 10. Before my mother left me she gave me a letter and told me to read it when they were gone. So I did and it read '[/font][font=Times New Roman]My child forgive me for I have brought misery to you. Your father never wanted a child. He claimed it was to much of a burden to have one and a waste of resources. I would have left him and kept you in my arms for ever, but I couldn't. He had all the money all the fortune . He protected us from everything that came our the monsters and hate people gave us. I love you my child survive for me. I will contact you again, if i ever can. Love Reiseett.' [/font][font=Comic Sans MS] I can't remember how she looks. How she speaks...not one detail. On my 16th birthday I got a letter from someone named '[/font][font=Times New Roman]Reiseett' [/font][font=Comic Sans MS]I knew the name sounded familiar. But I couldn't think at the moment of who it reminded me of. So I read it '[/font][font=Times New Roman]My child . I am very sorry for just now contacting you. I know it has been forever,. I am currently in Skyrim, if you want to find me. Your father is no longer with me. Or here at all. I am all alone . Without anyone. Contact me in the Rat way if you ever want to see me again... -R.' [/font][font=Comic Sans MS]. It took me a moment before I realized it was my mother. So that's how I came to Skyrim. If you care..." -Lilieah the Forgotten...
[/font][/size][/i]
author: MeowRawrLolNoIdea
